WELCOME.message: Welcome!  Open a new ssh connection with the 'open' command.
WELCOME.description: Message displayed to the user when the application is first launched

WELCOME_TIP.message: Pro Tip: You can save this session as a browser bookmark.
WELCOME_TIP.description: A short tip displayed after the WELCOME message.

CONNECT_MESSAGE.message: Please enter a destination to connect to.
CONNECT_MESSAGE.description: Message displayed in the connect dialog.

OK_BUTTON_LABEL.description: The label for the OK button in dialogs.

CANCEL_BUTTON_LABEL.description: The label for the Cancel button in dialogs.

DESTINATION_PATTERN.description: Text displayed in the destination textbox to hint at the expected format.

COMMAND_COMPLETE.message: The command $NAME$ completed with exit code $CODE$.  Please close this window at your leisure.
COMMAND_COMPLETE.description: Message displayed when the current command has completed.

CONNECTING.description: Status message shown when connecting to a host.

UNEXPECTED_ERROR.message: An unexpected error occurred, please chech the JavaScript console for more details.
UNEXPECTED_ERROR.description: Generic message displayed when we encounter an unexpected error.

MISSING_PARAM.description: Error message displayed when a command is missing a parameter.

BAD_DESTINATION.description: Error displayed when we can't parse the destination for the ssh command.

KNOWN_HOSTS_TITLE.description: Header text displayed before the list of known hosts.

KNOWN_HOSTS_EMPTY.message: No known hosts, nothing to forget.
KNOWN_HOSTS_EMPTY.description: Message displayed when there are no hosts to delete.

KNOWN_HOSTS_PROMPT.message: Please select a host to forget [1-$COUNT$]:
KNOWN_HOSTS_PROMPT.description: Prompt displayed by the ssh-forget-host command

CMD_SSH_HELP.message: The |username| and |hostname| parameters are required, |port| is optional.  If port is not specified it defaults to 22.
CMD_SSH_HELP.description: Long form help text for this command.  Do not translate the parameter names in |pipes|.

CMD_SSH_FORGET_HOST_HELP.message: This command displays a menu of known hosts and prompts for the host to forget.
CMD_SSH_FORGET_HOST_HELP.description: Long form help text for this command.  Do not translate the parameter names in |pipes|.
